thoughts: Is fascinated by the new ghostly world {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'ve/'s} stumbled into
Can't stand the sight of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} own dead body
Clings to the warmth of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} litter
Doesn't want to leave {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} litter behind
Is happy {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} kits get to grow up even if it is without {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Sobs knowing {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} kits won't grow up knowing {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Feels at peace knowing {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} kits are taken care of
Is untrusting of the Clan cats taking {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} kits
Wishes {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} kits had a chance to grow up
Is happy to not be seperated from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} litter
Wishes someone had found {PRONOUN/m_c/object} in time to save {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} kits
